snippet: Gov. Pat Quinn said that he had selected Paul Vallas, former chief of the Chicago schools and a 2002 candidate for governor, as his running mate for 2014.
abstract: Gov Pat Quinn of Illinois selects Paul Vallas, former chief of the Chicago schools and a 2002 candidate for governor, as his running mate for 2014.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat Quinn said that he had selected Paul Vallas, former chief of the Chicago schools and a 2002 candidate for governor, as his running mate for 2014.

headline.main: Illinois: Schools Chief Is Quinn Running Mate
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Schools Chief Is Quinn Running Mate
